value.string:
<dtml-let hwidth="310" mwidth="43" scwidth="58" optwidth="260" affwidth="65">
 
 ul li:before{
 content: "\00BB \0020";
 }
 
 .list_dialog {
 background-color: <dtml-var document_background_color>;
 margin: 0px;
 width: <dtml-var "hwidth">px;
 }
 
 .options_list {
 border-right: solid 1px;
 border-bottom: solid 1px;
 border-left: solid 1px;
 border-color: #3D7474;
 background-color: #C1DAD2;
 padding: 0px;
 width: <dtml-var "optwidth">px;
 margin-left: <dtml-var "(hwidth / 2)- (optwidth / 2)">px;
 display: none;
 }
 
 .aff_options {
 border-right: solid 1px;
 border-top: solid 1px;
 border-left: solid 1px;
 border-color: #3D7474;
 background-color: #D3E6DE;
 padding: 0px;
 width: <dtml-var "affwidth">px;
 margin-left: <dtml-var "(hwidth / 2)- (affwidth / 2)">px;
 text-align: center;
 padding-bottom: 2px;
 margin-top: 3px;
 margin-bottom: 2px;
 }
 
 .info {
 color: #3D7474;
 font-size: 13px;
 }
 
 .text_div {
 padding: 18px;
 }
 
 .fieldset_login {
 border-color: #3D7474;
 margin: 15px;
 }
 
 .login_div {
 border-top: solid 1px;
 border-bottom: solid 1px;
 border-bottom-color: #3D7474;
 border-top-color: #3D7474;
 background-color: #C1DAD2;
 margin-bottom: 3px;
 }
 
 .login {
 width: <dtml-var "hwidth">px;
 background-color: #DAE6E6;
 border: solid 1px;
 border-color: #FFFFFF;
 position: absolute;
 left: 0px;
 top: 0px;
 }
 
 .window {
 margin: 15px;
 }
 
 .button {
 border-Top-Width: thin;
 border-Top-Color: #3D6464;
 border-Right-Width: thin; 
 border-Right-Color: #3D6464;
 border-Bottom-Width: thin;
 border-Bottom-Color: #3D7474;
 border-Left-Width: thin;
 border-Left-Color: #3D7474;
 background-Color: #C1DAD2;
 margin: 2px;
 color: #3D6464;
 text-decoration: none;
 }
 
 .button_save {
 border-Top-Width: thin;
 border-Top-Color: #3D6464;
 border-Right-Width: thin; 
 border-Right-Color: #3D6464;
 border-Bottom-Width: thin;
 border-Bottom-Color: #3D7474;
 border-Left-Width: thin;
 border-Left-Color: #3D7474;
 background-Color: #C1DAD2;
 margin: 2px;
 color: #3D6464;
 text-decoration: none;
 width: 100px;
 }
 
 
 .shortcuts {
 border-top: solid 1px;
 border-bottom: solid 1px;
 border-color: #3D7474;
 background-color: #C1DAD2;
 margin-bottom: 5px;
 }
 
 .List_top {
 padding-left: 5px;
 padding-right: 5px;
 border-left: solid 0px;
 border-right: solid 0px;
 border-color: #3D7474;
 }
 
 .top_list {
 border-left: solid 1px;
 border-right: solid 1px;
 border-top: solid 1px;
 border-color: #3D7474;
 }
 
 .main_div_list {
 padding: 5px;
 margin-top: 0px;
 border-left: solid 1px;
 border-right: solid 1px;
 border-bottom: solid 1px;
 border-color: #3D7474;
 }
 
 .top1 {
 margin-top: 5px;
 margin-left: 10px;
 border-top: solid 1px;
 border-color: #3D7474;
 width: 45px;
 }
 
 .bottom1 {
 margin-right: 10px;
 border-bottom: solid 1px;
 border-color: #3D7474;
 width: 45px;
 position: absolute;
 right: 0px;
 margin-bottom: 7px;
 }
 
 .breadcrumb {
 border-top: solid 1px;
 border-bottom: solid 1px;
 border-bottom-color: #3D7474;
 border-top-color: #3D7474;
 background-color: #C1DAD2;
 }
 
 .erp {
 font-size: 18px;
 color: #3D7474;
 text-decoration: none;
 }
 
 .link_white {
 font-size: 14px;
 color: #FFFFFF;
 }
 
 .modu {
 font-size: 14px;
 color: #3D7474;
 font-style: bold;
 text-decoration: none;
 padding-right: 5px;
 }
 
 .mobil {
 font-size: 10px;
 font-style: italic;
 color: #3D7474;
 text-decoration: none;
 }
 
 .delimit_haut {
 height: 25px;
 border-right: solid 5px;
 border-color: #3D7474;
 background-color: #D3E6DE;
 }
 
 .delimit_bas {
 height: 25px;
 border-left: solid 5px;
 border-color: #3D7474;
 background-color: #D3E6DE;
 }
 
 .mod_badg {
 background-color: #D3E6DE;
 border-left: solid 1px;
 border-right: solid 1px;
 border-color: #3D7474;
 padding-top: 0.5em;
 padding-left: 10px;
 }
 
 .list {
 list-style: none;
 }
 
 .option {
 border-bottom: solid 1px;
 border-bottom-color: #3D7474;
 border-left: solid 1px;
 border-left-color: #3D7474;
 border-right: solid 1px;
 border-right-color: #3D7474;
 background-color: #D3E6DE;
 padding-top: 0.5em;
 padding-bottom: 0.5em;
 padding-left: 10px;
 }
 
 .modules {
 border-top: solid 1px;
 border-top-color: #3D7474;
 border-right: solid 1px;
 border-right-color: #3D7474;
 border-left: solid 1px;
 border-left-color: #3D7474;
 padding-left: 10px;
 background-color: #D3E6DE;
 }
 
 input#hidden_button {
 width: 0;
 height: 0;
 display: inline;
 border-width: 0;
 float: left;
 }
 
 img {
 border: transparent;
 }
 
 .small {
 font-size: 11pt;
 }
 
 .infield {
 overflow : auto;
 }
 
 textarea {
 width:100%;
 }
 
 .title {
 border-top: solid 1px;
 border-top-color: #3D7474;
 border-left: solid 5px;
 border-left-color: #3D7474;
 background-color: #D3E6DE;
 }
 
 .title_list {
 margin-left: 10px;
 margin-right: 10px;
 border-left: solid 5px;
 border-left-color: #3D7474;
 border-right: solid 5px;
 border-right-color: #3D7474;
 background-color: #D3E6DE;
 margin-bottom: 5px;
 }
 
 .title_index {
 border-bottom: solid 1px;
 border-bottom-color: #3D7474;
 border-left: solid 1px;
 border-right: solid 1px;
 border-left-color: #3D7474;
 margin-bottom: 8px;
 border-top: solid 1px;
 border-bottom: solid 1px;
 border-top-color: #3D7474;
 background-color: #C1DAD2;
 }
 
 .delimitation {
 border-top: solid 1px;
 border-top-color: #4e9fa0;
 }
 
 .group {
 border-right: solid 5px;
 border-right-color: #3D7474;
 border-bottom: solid 1px;
 border-bottom-color: #3D7474;
 position:absolute;
 background-color: #D3E6DE;
 right: 0px;
 }
 
 
 .div1 {
 background-color: #DAE6E6;
 position:absolute;
 left: 0px;
 top: 0px;
 width: <dtml-var "hwidth">px;
 }
 
 .master {
 width: <dtml-var "hwidth">px;
 background-color: #DAE6E6;
 position: absolute;
 left: 0px;
 }
 
 .big {
 font-size: 13pt;
 }
 
 .div2 {
 border-top: solid 1px;
 border-bottom: solid 1px;
 border-bottom-color: #3D7474;
 margin: 3px;
 border-top-color: #3D7474;
 background-color: #b7e8e8;
 }
 
 .div4 {
 border-top: solid 1px;
 border-top-color: #3D7474;
 border-bottom: solid 1px;
 border-bottom-color: #3D7474;
 padding-top: 2px;
 padding-bottom: 2px;
 background-color: #C1DAD2;
 margin-bottom: 5px;
 width:100%;
 }
 
 .link {
 color: #3D7474;
 font-size: 8pt;
 text-decoration: none;
 }
 
 .link2 {
 color: #3D7474;
 font-size: 12pt;
 text-decoration: none;
 font-weight: bold;
 }
 
 .link3 {
 color: #3D7474;
 font-size: 10pt;
 text-decoration: none;
 padding-left: 15px;
 }
 
 fieldset {
 border-color: #3D7474;
 overflow : auto;
 }
 
 .border {
 border-color: #3D7474;
 }
 
 .nomarg {
 line-height:90%;
 }
 
 .div_prev {
 margin-top: 10px;
 width: 0px;
 text-align:left;
 padding-left:5px;
 line-height:85%;
 margin-bottom: 10px;
 }
 
 .div_next {
 border-top: solid 1px;
 border-top-color: #3D7474;
 border-left: solid 1px;
 border-left-color: #3D7474;
 border-bottom: solid 1px;
 border-bottom-color: #3D7474;
 border-right: solid 1px;
 border-right-color: #3D7474;
 width: 60px;
 text-align:center;
 position: absolute;
 padding-right: 3px;
 right: 0px;
 line-height: 85%;
 top: 50px;
 }
 
 .div_sc {
 border: solid 1px;
 border-color: #3D7474;
 border-bottom: transparent;
 background-color: #D3E6DE;
 width:<dtml-var "scwidth">px;
 text-align: center;
 position: absolute;
 top: 50px;
 left: <dtml-var "(hwidth / 2)- (scwidth / 2)">px;
 padding: 0px;
 line-height:70%;
 }
 
 .div_gtt {
 border-top: solid 0px;
 border-bottom: solid 0px;
 border-top-color: #3D7474;
 border-bottom-color: #3D7474;
 border-left: solid 0px;
 border-left-color: #3D7474;
 border-right: solid 0px;
 border-right-color: #3D7474;
 background-color: #D3E6DE;
 margin: 0px;
 }
 
 .div1_list {
 width:<dtml-var "hwidth">px;
 background-color: #DAE6E6;
 border-color: #FFFFFF;
 position: absolute;
 left: 0px;
 top: 0px;
 }
 
 /* listbox */
 
 .ListSummary {
 background: url('<dtml-var expr="portal_url.getPortalPath()">/images/tab_left.png') top left no-repeat;
 color: #000;
 background-color: <dtml-var document_background_color>;
 padding-left: 10px;
 }
 
 .ListSummary table {
 width: 100%;
 padding-right: 5px;
 padding-bottom: 2px;
 }
 
 .ListSummary img {
 display: none;
 }
 
 .ListSummary #listbox_next_page,
 .ListSummary #listbox_previous_page {
 display: block;
 font-size: 0;
 width: 22px;
 height: 22px;
 }
 
 .ListContent {
 color: #000;
 background-color: <dtml-var document_background_color>;
 padding-left: 1px;
 }
 
 .ListContent table {
 width: 100%;
 }
 
 .ListContent #listbox_label_line {
 color: <dtml-var font_color>;
 background-color: <dtml-var listbox_label_background_color>;
 }
 
 .ListContent #listbox_stat_line {
 background-color: <dtml-var listbox_stat_background_color>;
 }
 
 .DataA {
 background-color: #DAE6E6 ;
 border-top: solid 1px;
 border-color: #3D7474;
 }
 
 .DataB {
 background-color: #FFFFFF;
 border-top: solid 1px;
 border-color: #3D7474;
 }
 
 .ListSummary #listbox_title_line #listbox_title,
 .ListSummary #listbox_title_line #listbox_item_number,
 .ListSummary #listbox_title_line #listbox_record_number {
 vertical-align: middle;
 }
 
 .ListContent tr.DataA:hover,
 .ListContent tr.DataB:hover {
 background-color: <dtml-var listbox_hover_background_color>;
 }
 
 .ListContent td {
 border-color: <dtml-var document_border_color>;
 }
 
 .right_title {
 background-color: #C1DAD2;
 padding-left: 5px;
 font-size: 16px;
 font-style: italic;
 color: #0000FF;
 }
 
 .left_data {
 text-decoration: none;
 padding-left: 30px;
 color: #000000;
 font-size: 12px;
 }
 
 .data {
 font-size: 10px;
 }
 
 .dialog_selector button .description {
 display: none;
 }
 
 .ListSummary img {
 display: none;
 }
 
 #favourites button .image {
 background-image: url('<dtml-var expr="portal_url.getPortalPath()">/images/favourite.png');
 }
 
 #modules button .image {
 background-image: url('<dtml-var expr="portal_url.getPortalPath()">/images/appearance.png');
 }
 
 #language button .image {
 background-image: url('<dtml-var expr="portal_url.getPortalPath()">/images/language.png');
 }
 
 #search button .image {
 background-image: url('<dtml-var expr="portal_url.getPortalPath()">/images/info.png');
 }
 
 #actions button .image {
 background-image: url('<dtml-var expr="portal_url.getPortalPath()">/images/exec16.png');
 }
 
 #context_bar .tool_buttons .jump_first .image {
 background-image: url('<dtml-var expr="portal_url.getPortalPath()">/images/2leftarrowb.png');
 }
 
 #context_bar .tool_buttons .jump_previous .image {
 background-image: url('<dtml-var expr="portal_url.getPortalPath()">/images/1leftarrowb.png');
 }
 
 #context_bar .tool_buttons .jump_next .image {
 background-image: url('<dtml-var expr="portal_url.getPortalPath()">/images/1rightarrowb.png');
 }
 
 #context_bar .tool_buttons .jump_last .image {
 background-image: url('<dtml-var expr="portal_url.getPortalPath()">/images/2rightarrowb.png');
 }
 
 #context_bar .tool_buttons .list_mode .image {
 background-image: url('<dtml-var expr="portal_url.getPortalPath()">/images/text_block.png');
 }
 
 #navigation_bar button .image,
 #context_bar button .image,
 .dialog_selector button .image,
 .document .actions button.save .image {
 display: block;
 width: 16px;
 height: 16px;
 }
 
 #navigation_bar button .description,
 #context_bar button .description,
 .content .field .description,
 .document .actions button.save .description,
 #context_bar .tool_buttons a .description {
 display: none;
 }
 
 #navigation_bar button,
 #context_bar button,
 .dialog_selector button,
 .document .actions button.save {
 border: 0;
 margin-top: 1px;
 margin-left: 2px;
 margin-right: 2px;
 padding: 0;
 position: relative;
 cursor: pointer;
 background-color: inherit;
 color: inherit;
 }
 
 #main_bar button .description,
 #context_bar button .description,
 .content .field .description,
 .document .actions button.save .description,
 #context_bar .tool_buttons a .description {
 display: none;
 }
 
 #context_bar .tool_buttons {
 vertical-align: middle;
 }
 
 #context_bar .tool_buttons a {
 margin-top: 2px;
 margin-left: 2px;
 margin-right: 2px;
 padding: 0;
 position: relative;
 }
 
 #context_bar .tool_buttons button,
 #context_bar .tool_buttons a {
 float: left;
 }
 
 #context_bar .tool_buttons a .image,
 #context_bar .tool_buttons button .image,
 #context_bar .tool_buttons a img {
 width: 16px;
 height: 16px;
 display: block;
 }
 
 p.clear {
 height: 0;
 margin: 0;
 padding: 0;
 clear: both;
 }
 
 .field label {
 width: 30%;
 font-size: 14px;
 color: #3D7474;
 font-style: italic;
 }
 
 .required label {
 font-weight: bold;
 }
 
 body {
 background-color: #DAE6E6;
 }
 
 #transition_message {
 margin-left: 1em;
 color: #f00;
 background-color: inherit;
 font-weight: bold;
 }
 
 .field .error {
 background-color: inherit;
 color: #f00;
 font-weight: bold;
 }
 
 #listbox_title_line {
 position: relative;
 }
 
 #listbox_page_selection {
 position: absolute;
 right: 5px;
 top: 3px;
 }
 
 #listbox_record_number {
 font-weight: bold;
 }
 
 #fieldset_left,
 #fieldset_right,
 #fieldset_center,
 #fieldset_bottom {
 border-width: 1px;
 border-style: solid;
 }
 
 #fieldset_left legend,
 #fieldset_right legend,
 #fieldset_center legend,
 #fieldset_bottom legend {
 display: none;
 }
 
 </dtml-let>
